While we take great pride in our long history, we are even more excited by the future. Our vision is to be the premier multi-industry company, recognized for our powerful brands, world-class enterprise processes and talented people. By placing customers first in everything we do, Textron continues to grow as an industry leader with strong brands such as Bell Helicopter, Cessna, Beechcraft, Hawker, Kautex, Lycoming, E-Z-GO, Textron Systems and Greenlee, among others. For more details please visit **www.textron.com**


Textron India Private Limited in Bangalore was incorporated in 2004 under the Companies Act, 1956, to better serve our customers around the world. This is a global resource that provides engineering and technological solutions for many Textron business units. We provide engineering and design services including but not limited to drafting, computer aided design, computer aided engineering, solid modeling, finite element analysis, sourcing, business development, marketing and other related activities and services in relation to the above sectors. Our facility has electronics labs and the potential for a vehicle and mechanical engineering workshop. For more details please visit **www.textron.in** .


**POSITION SUMMARY**


Textron Systems is looking for talented CAD Librarian to support the Textron Systems organization. This position will be responsible for creating and electrical and mechanical models in Computer Aided Drafting (CAD) software.


This role will receive tasking from CAD Administrators. You will work with engineers on the creation and quality checking of engineering vendor part models to support production technical data packages in compliance with Military, ASME, and Company standards and process guides. This role will include cataloging of vendor and supplier-controlled hardware, models, and specifications. The applicant will be expected to quickly develop skills necessary for utilization of company tools (NX-2206, SolidWorks, Siemens’ Capital, and JIRA).


**PRINCIPAL RESPONSIBILITIES**


* Creation and maintenance of mechanical hardware models from specification sheets.
* Creation and maintenance of electrical components and hardware models from specification sheets.
* Receive, create, and record JIRA tickets for tracking of assignments.
* Cataloging of vendor and supplier-controlled components, models, and specifications.
* Collaborate with other engineering disciplines and programs to support needed mechanical hardware and electrical components.
* Help generate supporting documentation and standards for use and creation of hardware parts.


**TECHNICAL COMPETENCIES**


* Associate degree in Drafting and Design Technology, or equivalent preferred.
* Experience in a 3D solid modeling software.
* Experience with 2D CAD software.
* Understanding of geometric dimensioning and tolerancing (GD&T).
* Ability to visualize components and assemblies in 3D.
* Knowledge of drafting principals.
* Knowledge of reading and understanding MIL specs and electrical spec drawings
* Familiarity with ASME Y14 standards.
* Proficiency with Microsoft Office products –Word, Excel, Outlook.
* Highly organized, efficient, and self-managing.
* Ability to communicate effectively verbally and in writing.


**ADDITIONAL COMPETENCIES**


Effective written and verbal communications


A good team player


Problem-solving skills


Cross cultural work experiences


Ability to work in a matrix organization.


**Qualifications**


Qualification -Bachelor or Masters in Electronics/Electrical Engineering, Mechanical Engineering/Aerospace/Aeronautical Engineering


Experience – Overall 3-4 years of experience with minimum of 2 years of experience in Wire diagram design.

**Position Overview:**


We are seeking an experienced and skilled Senior Database Developer to join our dynamic team. The ideal candidate will have a minimum of 8 years of hands-on experience in database development, with a strong focus on Neo4j (graph) databases. The role involves working on cutting-edge projects, contributing to data modelling, and ensuring the scalability and efficiency of our database systems.


**Responsibilities**:


* Design, develop, and maintain databases, with a primary focus on Cypher/graph databases.
* Modify databases according to requests and perform tests.
* Advanced Query, performance tuning of databases and optimization of database systems.
* Solve database usage issues and malfunctions.
* Analyze all databases and monitor them for all design specifications and prepare associated test strategies.
* Evaluate and engineer efficient backup-recovery processes for various databases.
* Promote uniformity of database-related programming effort by developing methods and procedures for database programming
* Remain current with the industry by researching available products and methodologies to determine the feasibility of alternative database management systems, communication protocols, middleware, and query tools.
* Liaise with developers to improve applications and establish best practices.
* Ensure the performance, security, and scalability of database systems.
* Develop and optimize PL/SQL queries for efficient data storage and retrieval.
* Implement and maintain data models, ensuring accuracy and alignment with business needs.
* Train, mentor and motivate the junior team members.
* Contribute in assessing the teams’ performance evaluation.
* Stay updated on emerging database technologies and contribute to continuous improvement initiatives.


**Skills Required:**


* 7+ years’ work experience as a Database developer
* Bachelor's or master's degree in computer science, Engineering, or a related field.
* Proficiency in Neo4j (graph) databases is mandatory.
* Strong experience with PL/SQL, data modeling, and database optimization techniques.
* Proven track record in designing and implementing scalable and efficient database solutions.
* In-depth understanding of data management (ex. permissions, recovery, security, and monitoring)
* DBA certification preferred.
* Experience with GIS tools and libraries
* Familiar with the internal working of Postgres
* Expertise In managing Concurrency and reversibility of transactions
* Handling SQL injection vulnerabilities

A career in our Managed Services team will provide you an opportunity to collaborate with a wide array of teams to help our clients implement and operate new capabilities, achieve operational efficiencies, and harness the power of technology.

To really stand out and make us fit for the future in a constantly changing world, each and every one of us at PwC needs to be a purpose-led and values-driven leader at every level. As a Senior Associate, you'll work as part of a team of problem solvers, helping to solve complex business issues from strategy to execution. PwC Professional skills and responsibilities for this management level include but are not limited to:

* Experience working in a continuous integration environment
* Must have experience in setting up Blue Prism Platform
* Must have experience in Blue Prism upgrades
* Hands-on proficiency in at least one programming language (Python, Java, .NET) and one scripting language (Bash, PowerShell) is essential.
* Must have experience in decommissioning of Automations and environment.

JOB DESCRIPTION

 For this opening we will consider candidates from the following locations: Bangalore,Karnataka,India |
   

  

  

Notified is hiring a Data QA Analyst in Bangalore.  
   
 Notified is looking for a talented and experienced Data QA Engineer with 3-5 years of experience to join our team. As a Data QA Engineer, you will play a critical role in ensuring the quality, accuracy, and reliability of our data and analytics solutions. You will work closely with cross-functional teams, including data engineers, analysts, and other stakeholders to develop and execute comprehensive testing plans for our data management and analytics platforms. As we continue to expand our reach and redefine the way organizations gather insights from media and data, we are seeking an experienced Data QA Engineer to join our growing team. In this role, you will contribute to shaping the future of our data infrastructure and ensuring its optimal performance and scalability.  
   
 HYBRID – This role will be based out of **The Leela Office** located on the 4th Floor, Airport Road, Kodihalli, Bangalore- 560008. Our expectation at this time, is that you would work from our office on Tuesdays, Wednesdays, Thursdays with flexibility to work from home on Mondays and Fridays.



 Responsibilities:


* Develop and execute test plans, test cases, and test scripts for validating data quality, integrity, and accuracy across various data sources, warehouses, and platforms.
* Work closely with data engineers and analysts to understand data requirements, identify, and troubleshoot data inconsistencies, and resolve data quality issues.

**Vantive: A New Company Built On Our Legacy**



  
 Baxter is on a journey to separate our ~$5B Kidney Care segment into a standalone company. Vantive\* will build on our nearly 70-year legacy in acute therapies and home and in-center dialysis to provide best-in-class care to the people we serve. We believe Vantive will not only build our leadership in the kidney care space, it will also offer meaningful work to those who join us.



  
 At Vantive, you will become part of a community of people who are focused, courageous and don’t settle for the mediocre. Each of us are driven to help improve patients’ lives worldwide. Join us as we revolutionize kidney care and other vital organ support.



* Completion of the proposed separation of Kidney Care from Baxter into a standalone company (to be named Vantive) remains subject to the satisfaction of customary conditions.



 **About Baxter**



 Baxter provides a broad portfolio of essential renal and hospital products, including home, acute and in-center dialysis;


 sterile IV solutions; infusion systems and devices; parenteral nutrition; surgery products and anesthetics; and pharmacy


 automation, software and services. The company’s global footprint and the critical nature of its products and services


 play a key role in expanding access to healthcare in emerging and developed countries. Baxter’s employees worldwide


 are building upon the company’s rich heritage of medical breakthroughs to advance the next generation of healthcare


 innovations that enable patient care.



 **Job Summary**



* Job Title – Senior Engineer, Sterility Assurance, Solutions
* Location – Whitefield, Bangalore



 This position is primarily responsible for the planning, designing, execution, documentation, data analysis and final report generation for sterilization cycle development, process qualification and Sterility Assurance studies for Solutions, drugs and devices. The candidate should have a strong background of sterilization Validation and should have a strong understanding of the scientific aspects related to sterilization and Sterility Assurance.



 The Sterility Assurance Engineer will be required to have the knowledge required to provide support in the following.



 Good understanding of the Science & Sterilization principles, guidance, regulations around sterilization validation & related to Sterility Assurance for Solutions. Design, development &Technical Understanding of Validation & Sterilization Engineering principles for Solutions and or devices.


* Planning, execution, and documentation of sterilization cycle development for Moist Heat Sterilization, (Knowledge of Ethylene Oxide sterilization, Radiation sterilization will be an additional skill)
* Good understanding of Life Cycle of sterilization development, Assessment of result & to verify if anything goes wrong in the process.


 Solid Leadership skills, team orientation and understanding of organizational cultural attributes.



 Candidate working with a Device Development Company- Research and Development, Quality Assurance, Validation, Sterilization, Sterility Assurance, Regulatory but should have a good knowledge of Regulations and GMP working environment. Exposure to product life cycle, Research and Development and product delivery is strongly desirable.



 **Essential Duties and Responsibilities**



* Contribute to technical feasibility analysis of complex research and design concepts including microbiology inputs for sterility assurance and related controls for the Solutions and devices/disposables.
* Play a lead role in the evaluation, selection and adaptation of various techniques, which accomplish business objectives such as quality, cost optimization and cycle-time.
* Design and perform Sterility Assurance Assessments and Sterilization qualification & validation studies in support of medical device, Solutions & pharmaceutical projects.
* Perform standard sterilization engineering assignments for application, validity and conformance to specifications.
* Utilize analytical process tools to solve complex process problems (e.g., FMEA, Risk Analysis, Process Modeling, Design of Experiments). Lead small project teams as needed to accomplish project objectives.
* Study and recommend techniques to improve existing products/processes and process controls.
* Provide sterilization support for Renal R&D projects and technical trouble shooting & to evaluate results relative to product requirements, definitions and/or program goals
* Analysis and evaluation of sterilization studies data and assist in the preparation of documentation using Good Documentation Practices (GDP).
* Employ appropriate techniques and methods to successfully conduct specific assignments within negotiated deadlines after receiving general instruction.
* Demonstrate working knowledge of basic technical theories and principles within area of expertise for routine tasks.
* Devise new approaches to complex problems through adaptations and modifications by use of standard technical principles.
* Maintain current knowledge of relevant Quality System Regulations and other regulatory requirements related to R&D (product development, design, and safety) to ensure compliance in all research, data collection and reporting activities.
* Develop reports and presentations on technical plans and results.
* Display a solid understanding of theories/practices utilized by other disciplines outside primary area of expertise.
* Ability to convince management on courses of action with minimal assistance using both written and verbal methods.
* Knowledge around microbiological aspects of biological indicators, Adventitious Agents and related microbiological concepts.


 **Qualifications**


* Master’s degree in a scientific discipline (Engineering &Technology) with minimum 6 years or BS with minimum 8 years’ experience in sterilization validation or equivalent.
* Prefer experience with Sterilization Validation, Device/Product Development Lifecycle, Global sterilization regulations & TQM methods (e.g. "six sigma")
* Display a solid technical understanding of Sterilization Engineering principles and qualification practices for Solution Sterilization & application of these principles on individual/small projects.
* The position requires technical skills for Solution sterilization using Moist heat (Steam), assessing critical changes & impact assessments, writing study rationale documents.
* Technical writing skills, remote support for projects, strong interpersonal skills and with a quick adaptive mindset for the new technologies.



 **Skills**


* Excellent English verbal and written communication skills, skilled to coordinate with global stake holders and support across the different time zones.
* Proficient with Sterilization validation principles and related testing for Biological indicators etc.
* Hands on experience cycle design and development and performing the sterilization studies for solutions with use of biological indicators.
* Highly adept at grasping and solving complex problems using root-cause analysis techniques.
* Ability to objectively identify technical solutions and make sound decisions
* Project management experience for Quality & value improvement projects
* Self-driven, resourceful, and able to work on multiple projects and priorities.
* Strong organization, attention to detail, and documentation skills.
* Strong acquaintance with technology, QMS tools and collaboration tools over the web: e.g. Trackwise, Document tools, WebEx, Teams, Microsoft Office products, etc.



 **A Career That Matters**


 Baxter’s employees are united in a mission to save and sustain lives. We are passionate about applying scientific


 innovation to meet the needs of the millions of people worldwide who depend on our medically necessary therapies and


 technologies. We focus on increasing access to healthcare, innovating in crucial areas of unmet need, and pursuing


 creative collaborations that bring our mission to life for patients every day.



 **Equal Employment Opportunity**


 Baxter is an equal opportunity employer. Baxter evaluates qualified applicants without regard to race, color, religion,


 gender, national origin, age, sexual orientation, gender identity or expression, disability/handicap status or any other


 legally protected characteristic.

 Baxter is committed to working with and providing reasonable accommodations to individuals with disabilities globally. **About us**



  
 At ExxonMobil, our vision is to lead in energy innovations that advance modern living and a net-zero future. As one of the world’s largest publicly traded energy and chemical companies, we are powered by a unique and diverse workforce fueled by the pride in what we do and what we stand for.



  
 The success of our Upstream, Product Solutions and Low Carbon Solutions businesses is the result of the talent, curiosity and drive of our people. They bring solutions every day to optimize our strategy in energy, chemicals, lubricants and lower-emissions technologies.



  
 We invite you to bring your ideas to ExxonMobil to help create sustainable solutions that improve quality of life and meet society’s evolving needs. Learn more about **our What and our Why** and how we canwork **together**.





**What role you will play in our team**
---------------------------------------





  
 ExxonMobil is seeking a qualified individual with PhD background to provide technology development support for a variety of projects including Conventional Oil & Gas, Unconventionals and Carbon Capture & Storage (CCS). The successful candidate will be responsible for working with multi-discipline teams (reservoir / geoscience / data science) to provide support in ideation, planning, documentation, development, stewardship and execution of new technologies. The position is located at ExxonMobil campus in Bangalore. ExxonMobil will not consider qualified candidates without permanent right to work in India.






**What you will do**
--------------------





  

* The role involves a combination of technical, analytical, and project management responsibilities to drive innovation and efficiency in upstream oil and gas operations and modeling workflows, including carbon capture and sequestration applications.
* Supporting Technology Development: Coordinate with Business Units, Project Teams and Management to assist in the development and implementation of differentiating technologies across subsurface workflows focused on reservoir modeling and simulation.
* Technology Management: Oversee the development and management of technology solutions by facilitating the technology stage-gate process and supporting research and development efforts.
* Process Optimization: Contribute to the design and optimization of processes and workflows for the efficient and safe production of oil and gas as well as carbon capture and sequestration, while mitigating risks.
* Technology Development Strategy: Work with project teams to monitor and evaluate in-house and external technology development options to advocate for and settle on optimal strategy.






**About You**
-------------





 **Skills and Qualifications**



  
 Technical skill requirements are as follows:


  

* Minimum PhD degree with research in related areas (preferably Petroleum, Chemical or Mechanical) and score 70% and above (equivalent CGPA)
* Research experience in the area of reservoir modeling and simulation or technology development or process optimization or fluid flow simulation or potential application of artificial intelligence (AI) and machine learning (ML) to integrated reservoir modeling.
* Previous experience in analytical performance prediction, data management, and technical report writing is required.
* Any previous industry experience in the areas of reservoir modeling and simulation studies, modeling workflows, uncertainty assessment, pressure transient test analysis will provide additional advantage.
* Candidates should be self-motivated and focused on achieving business results through a multi-discipline team.
* Demonstrated teamwork and communication skills are essential.






**Preferred Qualifications / Experience**
-----------------------------------------





  

* Strong reservoir modeling/simulation skills
* Technology development experience
* Project management experience
* Awareness/experience with Petrel workflows, Python scripting, data analytics, surrogate modeling, optimization
* Awareness of advances in the application of artificial intelligence (AI) and machine learning (ML) to challenges in reservoir evaluation and management






**Your benefits**
-----------------





  
 An ExxonMobil career is one designed to last. Our commitment to you runs deep our employees grow personally and professionally, with benefits built on our core categories of health, security, finance and life. We offer you:


  


* Competitive compensation

Designation: Control & Safety System Engineer


Salary: Based on the Experience


Experience: 8 to 12 years


Education: B.E Electrical or Mechanical


Job Location: Bangalore


Industry: Oil and Gas / Industrial


**Job Description** 


A Control & Safety System Engineer in the oil and gas sector is responsible for the design, implementation, and maintenance of control and safety systems that ensure the safe, reliable, and efficient operation of oil and gas facilities. This role involves working on a range of projects, from new installations to upgrades and optimization of existing systems, to meet industry standards and regulatory requirements.


**Responsibilities:** 


1. Design and Engineering: Develop detailed engineering designs for control and safety systems, including Distributed Control Systems (DCS), Programmable Logic Controllers (PLC), Emergency Shutdown Systems (ESD), Fire and Gas Detection Systems, and High-Integrity Pressure Protection Systems (HIPPS). Ensure designs align with project specifications, safety standards, and operational requirements.


2. Programming and Configuration: Program and configure control and safety system hardware and software to implement control strategies, logic sequences, alarms, and interlocks. Conduct testing and simulation to validate system functionality and performance before deployment.


3. Integration and Interfacing: Collaborate with multidisciplinary teams to integrate control and safety systems with other plant systems, such as instrumentation, electrical, mechanical, and process control systems. Develop interface protocols and communication networks to facilitate seamless data exchange and interoperability.


4. Documentation and Compliance: Prepare and maintain technical documentation, including system specifications, functional descriptions, configuration documents, test procedures, and operating manuals. Ensure compliance with industry standards and regulations, such as ISA/IEC 61511, API RP 14C, and NFPA 85/86.


5. Training and Support: Provide training and technical support to operations personnel on the use, operation, and maintenance of control and safety systems. Conduct regular knowledge transfer sessions to enhance the competency and capability of the operations team.


6. Continuous Improvement: Identify opportunities for system optimization, performance enhancement, and cost reduction through the application of advanced control strategies, automation technologies, and predictive maintenance techniques. Participate in risk assessments and management reviews to drive continuous improvement initiatives.


**Qualifications: -** 


Bachelor's degree in Electrical Engineering, Control Systems Engineering, or a related field.


- 3-7 years of experience in control and safety system engineering within the oil and gas industry, with hands-on experience in DCS, PLC, ESD, F&G, and HIPPS systems.


- Proficiency in programming languages and software tools used in control system engineering, such as ladder logic, Function Block Diagrams (FBD), Structured Text (ST), and Human-Machine Interface (HMI) development.


- Strong knowledge of industry standards and regulations governing control and safety systems, including ISA/IEC 61511, API RP 14C, NFPA 85/86, and SIL classification methodologies.


- Excellent problem-solving skills and analytical abilities, with a focus on root cause analysis and troubleshooting of complex technical issues.


- Effective communication and interpersonal skills, with the ability to collaborate with cross-functional teams and communicate technical concepts to non-technical stakeholders.


Job Type: Full-time


Pay: ₹40,000.00 - ₹60,000.00 per month


Schedule:


* Day shift


Experience:


* Control & Safety System Engineer: 9 years (Preferred)


Work Location: In person

**Vantive: A New Company Built On Our Legacy**



  
 Baxter is on a journey to separate our ~$5B Kidney Care segment into a standalone company. Vantive\* will build on our nearly 70-year legacy in acute therapies and home and in-center dialysis to provide best-in-class care to the people we serve. We believe Vantive will not only build our leadership in the kidney care space, it will also offer meaningful work to those who join us.



  
 At Vantive, you will become part of a community of people who are focused, courageous and don’t settle for the mediocre. Each of us are driven to help improve patients’ lives worldwide. Join us as we revolutionize kidney care and other vital organ support.



* Completion of the proposed separation of Kidney Care from Baxter into a standalone company (to be named Vantive) remains subject to the satisfaction of customary conditions.



 **Job Title:**


 **Principal Engineer – Software Verification & Validation**


 **Summary:**


 Baxter has long been on the forefront of developing innovative solutions for patients with kidney disease. This position offers a unique and exciting opportunity to contribute to the design, development and support of Baxter’s Cloud based software that is related to our connected medicine strategy. The Cloud based software will support connectivity of medical devices (Internet-of-Things “IoT”) and mobile devices in the home and in clinics. The Cloud based software will support management of medical treatments at home/clinics and also enable management of the supply chain related to various medical treatments. The Cloud based software will also have an analytics component that will enable improved clinical outcomes and enable Baxter to develop better strategy based on deep insights.


 You will be responsible for verification and validation of software products for new and existing products of our Kidney Care division’s Digital Health portfolio. The successful candidate will possess solid “hands-on” technical abilities, demonstrate excitement and energy for product development, and a passion for their work and the impact it has on meeting the needs of patients.



 **Responsibilities:**


* Provide leadership to effectively define, communicate and execute test strategies to ensure product quality and delivery are maintained.
* Lead and collaborate with verification team to drive improvements to test execution, quality and delivery.
* Communicate testing requirements and strategy and provide guidance to software testers and stakeholders as needed.
* Plan and execute system integration activities to minimize issues in systems verification.
* Contribute to design and development of test cases, test scripts, defect reports and traceability matrix.
* Review work products including test plans, test cases, test data and automated test scripts.
* Contribute to efficiency improvements within the V&V function.
* Play a front ending role in ISO audits and quality reviews.
* Establish traceability of verification artifacts to requirements.
* Drive simplification and process optimization initiatives across the function.
* Develop and maintain an effective and corroborative working relationship with internal and external development partners.



 **Qualifications:**


* A demonstrated track record in regulated software development, preferably medical devices or other highly regulated products such as aviation software.
* Experience leading medium to large V&V teams.
* Experience in defining and executing verification strategies including functional, non-functional, reliability and performance.
* Working knowledge of enterprise or embedded software architecture nuances.
* Hands on experience with software test automation tools.
* Experience in building/enhancing test automation frameworks.
* 5 years of experience into data & analytics projects.
* Strong Knowledge of the Data visualization tools Tableau Or BI.
* Strong learning and comprehension of SQL and capacity to write SQL Queries.
* Knowledge of medical device software development & verification is highly preferred including knowledge of standards such as IEC 62304, ISO 13485.
* Experience working with globally distributed teams and demonstrated superior collaboration with stakeholders.
* Ability to lead small to medium sized team technically and raising his/her own performance and others from time to time.
* Demonstrated risk taking ability and challenges status quo.



 **Background and/or Experience:**


 Bachelors / Masters in Computer Science, Software Engineering, Electrical Engineering, Electronics & Communications or related field with 12-15 years of related work experience.

Bengaluru, Karnataka, India

About NetApp  
 We’re forward-thinking technology people with heart. We make our own rules, drive our own opportunities, and try to approach every challenge with fresh eyes. Of course, we can’t do it alone. **Job summary**
---------------




 NetApp has roughly 19k Windows and 5k Mac end-user endpoints under management, supported across 60 sites and 22 countries around the world. NetApp is an engineering company, and a large percentage of the employee population researches, designs, and builds software and systems. This position has primary responsibility for the hardening and hygiene of end user Windows & MacOS laptops, including audit/review/removal of user installed applications, hardening and hygiene, overall management of approved/denied applications and application versions. This is an engineering role – not an operations role. While operation of the platform falls under this role, its operation occurs largely through code and automation.






**Job requirements**
--------------------




 Must have:


* Experience implementing OS hardening for Windows and Mac operating systems per NIST 800-171 or similar requirements

* Some development / scripting experience (e.g. Powershell, Python, etc) as well as automation skills (tool agnostic)

 You might also have:


* A degree or equivalent experience in Computer Science or related field
* Familiarity with PowerBI, SQL, or other reporting tools
* Experience with Microsoft cloud technologies such as Azure AD, Azure Information Protection, Cloud App Security and Defender ATP
* Experience in cyber security and red team/blue team activities






**Education**
-------------




 Preferred 3 years of related experience with a Bachelor’s degree or equivalent work experience.

 Location

Bengaluru, Karnataka Full job description
--------------------


**Job Description**
  
 Join our Center of Excellence (CoE) unit in Product Development & Engineering and be part of a collaborative and inclusive environment that values diverse ideas. As an SAP Functional Engineer, you'll enjoy the freedom and ownership to positively impact your deliverables. You’ll collaborate closely with the product managers, cross-functional teams, and other stakeholders, and be at the forefront of understanding our organizational needs


 At CoE, we embrace experimentation and risk-taking, empowering our team members to try new approaches, fostering a culture of innovation. Quality is paramount, and we emphasize ownership, diligence, and the delivery of high-quality products, services, and solutions. Continuous learning is a core value at CoE. We value open dialogue, appreciations, and timely feedback to ensure our engineers stay at the forefront of new technologies and market trends. Join us and contribute to a culture of continuous improvement and excellence


 **Responsibilities**


* Collaborate with Product managers to gather and prioritize requirements for ongoing initiatives.
* Lead the design and implementation of complex SAP EWM solutions.
* Work with best practices for the full software.This includes configuration in SAP, planning and executing tests, planning and execution of production deploy, and support for a limited period after go-live
* Optimize existing SAP EWM solutions for performance and efficiency
* Play a key role in integration efforts with other SAP modules and external systems, overseeing data mapping and transformation processes.
* Take ownership of resolving complex issues related to SAP EWM functionality, collaborating with technical teams when necessary.
* Contribute to business process optimization and automation initiatives, identifying opportunities for efficiency gains.
* Mentor and guide junior team members in SAP EWM configurations and processes, fostering their professional development.
* Collaborate with external consultants and vendors on specialized SAP EWM initiatives.
* Represent the SAP EWM team in high-level meetings and discussions with key stakeholders.


  
  **Qualifications**
  

* **5-8 years of hands-on experience with SAP EWM**, with a minimum of 4 years dedicated to SAP EWM implementations or rollouts.
* Proficient in configuring inbound, outbound & internal processes.
* Flexible and able to work in an environment that may not be formalized yet.
* Leadership experience, ability to coach others in a way that enables them to grow professionally and to increase their performance.
 Agile working Practice 
 * **Good to have**
* Ability to understand and debug ABAP code.
* Experience /knowledge in Warehouse automation.
* Experience working with S4


  
  **Additional Information**
  
 This is a **full-time position,** starting in March 2024.  
 Apply by sending in your **CV in English** as soon as possible, but no later than the **20th of May** . Due to data policies, we only accept applications through the SmartRecruiters or career page.  
   
 **Benefits**  
 We offer all our employees at H&M Group attractive benefits with extensive development opportunities around the globe. All our employees receive a staff discount card, usable on all our H&M Group brands in stores and online. Brands covered by the discount are H&M (Beauty and Move included), COS, Weekday, Monki, H&M HOME, & Other Stories, ARKET, Afound. In addition to our staff discount, all our employees are included in our H&M Incentive Program – HIP. You can read more about our H&M Incentive Program here.  
   
 *In addition to our global benefits, all our local markets offer different competitive perks and benefits. Please note that they may differ between employment types and countries.*  
   
 **Inclusion & Diversity**  
 *At H&M Group, we’re determined to create and maintain inclusive, diverse, and equitable workplaces throughout our organization. Our teams should consist of a variety of people who share and combine their knowledge, experience, and ideas. Having a diverse workforce leads to a positive impact on how we address challenges, on what we perceive possible, and on how we choose to relate to our colleagues and customers all over the world. Hence all diversity dimensions are taken into consideration in our recruitment process.*  
   
 *We strive to have a fair and equal process and therefore kindly ask you not to attach a cover letter to your application as it often contains information that can easily trigger unintentional biases.*  
   
 **Company Description**  
 H&M Group is a family of brands; H&M, COS, Weekday, Monki, H&M HOME, & Other Stories, ARKET, and Afound. At H&M Group, our people are the driving force behind our commitment to creating meaningful growth and more sustainable lifestyles. Help us re-imagine fashion and together we will re-shape our industry. Learn more about H&M Group here

 Full job description
--------------------


At PayPal (NASDAQ: PYPL), we believe that every person has the right to participate fully in the global economy. Our mission is to democratize financial services to ensure that everyone, regardless of background or economic standing, has access to affordable, convenient, and secure products and services to take control of their financial lives.


Job Description Summary: Job Description Summary: What you need to know about the role: This role is for the Engineering Manager of the Compliance Investigations India team, which supports critical initiatives across the Investigations domain. You would be responsible for leading a team of engineers in ideating and envisioning, design, development, test and deployment of a range of services on the Compliance Investigations platform. A successful candidate will have an established background in developing Java backend applications, strong technical ability, excellent project management skills, great communication skills and a motivation to achieve results in a fast-paced environment. Meet our team: The Compliance Investigations team, is part of the global Compliance Platform Technology organization with colleagues in India, US, Ireland, Singapore and Central America. Our team is composed of mid to senior-level engineers, and is focused on challenges like optimizing API performance, delivering architectural improvements for greater scalability and providing our teammates with the tools and platforms they need to excel.


Job Description: 


**Job Description:**


 **Your way to impact:**


* Successful candidates will be strong leaders who can prioritise well, communicate clearly and have a consistent track record of delivery.
* Responsible for the over-all systems development life cycle of a key services and applications in Compliance Investigations (CI)
* Play a key role in the broader architectural and design decision making processes.
* Manage the day-to-day activities of the engineering team within an Agile/Scrum environment.
* Management of departmental resources, staffing, mentoring, enhancing and maintaining a best-of-class engineering team.
* Work closely with the engineers to architect and develop the best technical design and approach.
* Report on status of development, quality, operations and system performance to management.
* Bring fresh ideas for how to continuously improve our software and the team.
* Advocate for ways to remediate technical debt on an ongoing basis.
* Mentor and train engineers to foster a culture of learning and continuous improvement.


 **Your day to day:**


* Manage and lead a software development team that is part of a larger technology organization spanning multiple locations.
* Help the team optimize processes, workflows, and developer experiences, so that every day our work can be more streamlined and efficient.
* Provide mentorship and growth opportunities for developers, partnering with Product managers to create the opportunities and challenges that will help them level up.
* Contribute to the engineering vision of the org by collaborating with other engineering leaders to define how we can rise to meet the demands of tomorrow.
* Facilitate and drive key technology decisions with senior technology stakeholders.
* Recruit, retain and manage highly effective engineering teams, conducting performance reviews and making compensation decisions.
* Be a mentor, technical and thought leader for a talented team of back-end engineers, challenging them and helping them grow.
* Partner with business units, product management, program management and cross-functional teams to deliver business results with agility and high quality balancing aggressive roadmap against engineering principles.
* Build a culture of learning and sharing technology insights across the technology teams.
* Drive consistent practices in hiring, training and development across the technology organisation.
* Bring innovation to the table that helps in improving the products/services you are responsible for.
* Looking for continuous improvement in productivity and quality.
* Deep collaboration with cross functional engineering and product teams to evolve the Compliance Technology platform.


 **What do you need to bring:**


* BS/MS in Computer Science or related field with 11+ years of software development
* 3+ years of experience in managing and growing engineering teams.
* Experience with data-intensive architectures and an understanding of the best-practices that lead to scalability.
* Knowledge of RESTful APIs and cloud infrastructure.
* A self-motivated mindset with a high degree of ownership.
* The positive attitude and empathy to be a cultural leader and inspire the team to do their best.
* Knowledge of Java, web services (REST/JSON/GraphQL) and related technologies.
* Excellent written and verbal communication skills.
* Strong Agile skills and proven track record for product delivery.
* Any exposure in Fintech/Compliance/Regulatory Tech is a plus

Bengaluru, Karnataka Full job description
--------------------


**Summary**
  

  
 Posted: 14 Nov 2023 
   

  
 Role Number:**200512341**
  

  
 Imagine what you could do here. At Apple, great ideas have a way of becoming great products, services, and customer experiences very quickly. Bring passion and dedication to your job and there's no telling what you could accomplish. Are you interested in applying your quantitative skills in a fast paced tech environment? If so, then this is the job for you. The Worldwide Sales and Operations Advanced Analytics team is looking for an experienced Manager in the Data Science and Machine Learning space with a deep passion for analytical solutions that have direct and measurable impact to Apple and its customers. The role involves leading a highly qualified team of data engineers and data science and design, build and deploy predictive and prescriptive end-to-end solutions for strategic and tactical supply chain decision-making. 
   

  
 **Key Qualifications**
  

* 12+ years of experience with 5+ years managing and leading a team of data engineering and machine learning scientists
* Strong partner - invested in the collective success of the team and project outcomes along with developing the talent within the team
* Current or prior hands on experience in developing end to end solutions for predictive analytics, forecasting, decisioning and automation (ML Ops)
* Practical experience solving real world problems and understanding of algorithms for classification, regression, clustering, and anomaly detection
* Experience in the field of univariate, multi variate and forecasting models in general
* Familiarity with cloud database technologies like AWS, Snowflake, Singlestore etc.
* Excellent software architecture and design skills
* Sound communication skills - adept at messaging domain and technical content, at a level appropriate for the audience.
* Innate curiosity and bias to action with expert ability to identify, define and implement project plans and develop modeling approaches suitable for the problem
* Self-sufficient with an ability to thrive in an environment of autonomy amidst ambiguity
Experience prototyping and developing software in programming languages (Java/C++/Python/Perl) 
 

  

  
 **Description**
  

  
 As an ML Manager, we look forward to your engaging with business teams to find opportunities, driving critical projects, building and sustaining production applications and working collaboratively across teams to get things done. - Implement data science pipelines and applications in a general programming language such as Python, Scala, Java or C++ - Deliver data analytics to the organization at scale as a key member of a small team of experts - Design and develop Machine Learning based models to solve complex supply chain problems, with a focus on predictive analytics and forecasting - Build large scale execution models in ambiguous environments - Collaborate effectively with other business partners (supply demand planners, retail team, apple care etc.), peer data scientists, and IT groups - Determine essential tradeoffs within the models and take an active role in clearly communicating the recommendations to senior management 
   

  
 **Education & Experience**
  

  
 BTech in Computer Science or IT / MBA from a premier school 
   

  
 **Additional Requirements**
  

+ Supply chain operations planning and material management experience and/or prior role in supporting supply chain business processes preferred
+ Experience with large data sets, Big Data and analytics
+ Strong communication and presentation skills

BETSOL is a cloud-first digital transformation and data management company offering products and IT services to enterprises in over 40 countries. BETSOL team holds several engineering patents, is recognized with industry awards, and BETSOL maintains a net promoter score that is 2x the industry average. 


BETSOL’s open source backup and recovery product line, Zmanda (Zmanda.com), delivers up to 50% savings in total cost of ownership (TCO) and best-in-class performance. 


BETSOL Global IT Services (BETSOL.com) builds and supports end-to-end enterprise solutions, reducing time-to-market for its customers. 


BETSOL offices are set against the vibrant backdrops of Broomfield, Colorado and Bangalore, India. 


We take pride in being an employee-centric organization, offering comprehensive health insurance, competitive salaries, 401K, volunteer programs, and scholarship opportunities. Office amenities include a fitness center, cafe, and recreational facilities.
